content: this perfect beginner hat is kicking off our series of new patterns inspired by local transit lines the n judah light rail runs right in front of our studio in san francisco making it the obvious choice for our new hat if this is your first hat new skills include knitting in the round and using double pointed needles customize it with options for a folded brim and a pom pom level beginning knitting sizes small - child large - adult materials small - 1 x 100 gram ball love fest fibers twin merino large - 2 x 100 gram ball love fest fibers twin merino us size 13 9 mm 16 circular and double pointed needles or size necessary to achieve gauge pom pom maker optional gauge 2 5 stitches per inch in 1 x 1 ribbing
